info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 23 at 4:04PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Maricopa Counties through 515 PM MST... At 403 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Scottsdale, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. The hail may be strong enough to cover the ground. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hazardous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Scottsdale, Fountain Hills, Round Valley, Sugarloaf Mountain, Sycamore Creek, Ballantine Trailhead, Sunflower, New River, Cave Creek, Carefree, Deer Valley Airport, McDowell Mountain Park, North Mountain Park, Desert Mountain, Metro Center Mall, Scottsdale Airport, Desert Ridge Marketplace and Rio Verde. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 208 and 222. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 10 and 15. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 203 and 222. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
